# timeRange

**Instance Property**

The time range during which the system doesn’t modify the scene.

## Declaration

```swift
var timeRange: CMTimeRange { get }
```

## Inspecting the scene

- **hasActiveCaptions**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the scene contains one or more active captions.
- **needsPeriodicRefresh**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the scene requires redrawing while your app progresses through the content.
